relevant_patterns.description: Use collaborative filtering to suggest products based on user behavior and preferences.
Ensure GDPR compliance by implementing data protection policies and procedures.
Implement mobile-first design to ensure a seamless user experience across devices.
Use API-based integration to connect with third-party services and enhance product offerings.

suggestions.suggestion: Implement AI-powered product recommendations and enhance customer reviews and ratings systems.
suggestions.rationale: Improve user experience and increase product discovery.

suggestions.suggestion: Implement HTTPS protocol for secure transactions and utilize caching mechanisms for improved performance.
suggestions.rationale: Ensure secure transactions and improve performance.

compliance_notes: Ensure compliance with GDPR regulations by implementing data protection policies and procedures.
Use secure payment gateways to protect user data.
integration_recommendations: Integrate with third-party services using API-based integration to enhance product offerings.
Utilize containerization for scalability and efficiency.
